title: Prepare Section of 10-Q Report
description: An accounting manager needs to draft the Management's Discussion and Analysis (MD&A) section for the quarterly 10-Q filing.

tasks.description: Gather financial statements and variance reports for the quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the income statement, balance sheet, and budget vs. actual reports.

tasks.description: Analyze the financial results and identify key trends and drivers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that revenue growth was driven by a new product launch.

tasks.description: Draft a narrative for the MD&A section explaining the quarterly performance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a draft of the MD&A section incorporating the key findings.
